modName: In A Movie for RealVision ENB
summary:
This mos, is many things at the same time.
1. The Twaked version of enblocals.ini and envseries.ini for RealVision enb option B that you can find here : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?

2. Tweaked version of the skyrim ini's
descriptionHtml:
What i hate the most of games are blur and bloom that makes everything blury at 10 feets. i know they use this to not be oblige to push he further detail,and till look real,but i prefer a clean cinematic image,thats why i have done this tweak for an enb that i love, RealVision.
I know it wont please everyone,but i like it like that , so if you want to make a cool movie in skyrim and have the pc for give it a try.
The fps in the video is not that good i had to use fraps,but i get between 30-50 fps with almost all 2k and 4k textures


This is For monster pc first.
i run this on a i7 4790k 4,4 ghz
                      2 gtx 980
                      16 gig ddr3

So if you have this kind of pc or better.

<object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" style="width:1280px; height:720px;" data="http://www.youtube.com/v/EUhslBfiAdU?color2=FBE9EC&version=3">
        <param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/EUhslBfiAdU?color2=FBE9EC&version=3" />
        <param name="allowFullScreen" value="true" />
        <param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always" />
        </object><div style="font-size: 0.8em"><a href="http://www.tools4noobs.com/online_tools/youtube_xhtml/">Get your own valid XHTML YouTube embed code</a></div>


 
This mod , aims to get rid of all blur, and to push the view distance, texture rendering,  and makes the image come trought the screen.

1. Download and install RealVision Enb
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?

2. copy my version of enblocals and enbseries that you can find in the enb ini's folder and overwrite the relvision one.
    i modified subsurfacescaterin
      ssao ssil
      refexions
      eyes
      aa
      maxed out all effect
      using supersampling
      removed blur

for the skyrim ini part
1. download this mod: Stable ugrid to load
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41592/?

2. take my skyrim.ini and skyrimpref.ini and overite yours.
Make a backup of your file before.
i pushed the ugrid to 13
added cpls of lines in the ini's to activate some shaders
tweaked shadows
pushed lod rendering
maxedsome setting for the trees to render better.

Impotant:
Change the language in skyrim.ini to your language,mine set to french

you can use the enb part only,but it will be ugly as you will see low rez lods in the beackgrounds


thanx and credits to:
SkyrimTuner for RealVision and permission to upload modified version of his great enb
author: Soulrav3r
